title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Bethany Retirement Living
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was very welcoming- from the initial phone call, to coming to the front desk for the interview, to people we walked by in the hallways saying hello; I experienced nothing but great and friendly interactions.
Interview Questions: Asked questions about schooling, interest in long term care, and allowed me to ask questions as well.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Bethany Retirement Living (Fargo, ND) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Filled out application online, was called within 20 minutes. Interview the following day. Interviewer asked about 5-6 questions and then went over company missions, values, and policies. Was offered job on the spot and was sent immediately to Sanford OccMed for TB test, flu shot, and drug test.
Interview Questions: What was one struggle in your last job and how did you overcome it?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bethany Retirement Living (Fargo, ND) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: Fill out Application either online or ask for one at the Front Desk, they are usually quite fast with getting back to applicants. Once called in for Interview they will give you an answer within a week.
Interview Questions: What is one of your favorite things about being a CNA?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bethany Retirement Living (Fargo, ND) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: Short interview process,  basic questions that were seeking answers that reflected who you are as a person, your values, and why you are interested in pursuing a job at Bethany
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?
